name: Diceia
description:
Chances are always slim. In this game, you are a regular person who wants to play some card game. Your goal is simple — collect all winning blue-ish cards that are very rare.

You play this game with the best technology — with your brain and mouse! You can find a more complex tutorial on how to play this game inside the main menu. But basically, you have to turn favors in the way you want by buying the right cards. Many strategies are applicable — will you try to make one yourself?

Cards have many effects which can turn the whole game upside down. Will you discover all of them?

If you found anything that you think should not be in the game, let us know in our Discord community. Also: there you can chat about the game or talk about the strategies! 

For best experience play the game in fullscreen on FULL HD display.

Made with love by Matěj Cajthaml (DenOwq) and Sebastian Himmer (Sebight) in less than 50 hours for GMTK GameJam!
